00032   const char *RangeServerProtocol::m_command_strings[] = {

00052   const char *RangeServerProtocol::command_text(uint64_t command) {
00053     if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00054       return "UNKNOWN";
00055     return m_command_strings[command];
00056   }
00057 
00058   CommBuf *
00059   RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(const TableIdentifier &table,
00060       const RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log,
00061       const RangeState &range_state) {
00062     CommHeader header(COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE);
00063     if (table.id == 0) // If METADATA table, set the urgent bit
00064       header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT;
00065     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, table.encoded_length()
00066         + range.encoded_length() + encoded_length_str16(transfer_log)
00067         + range_state.encoded_length());
00068     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00069     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00070     encode_str16(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address(), transfer_log);
00071     range_state.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00072     return cbuf;
00073   }
00074 
00075   CommBuf *
00076   RangeServerProtocol::create_request_update(const TableIdentifier &table,
00077       uint32_t count, StaticBuffer &buffer) {
00078     CommHeader header(COMMAND_UPDATE);
00079     if (table.id == 0) // If METADATA table, set the urgent bit
00080       header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT;
00081     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 4 + table.encoded_length(), buffer);
00082     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00083     cbuf->append_i32(count);
00084     return cbuf;
00085   }
00086 
00087   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::
00088   create_request_create_scanner(const TableIdentifier &table,
00089       const RangeSpec &range, const ScanSpec &scan_spec) {
00090     CommHeader header(COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER);
00091     if (table.id == 0) // If METADATA table, set the urgent bit
00092       header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT;
00093     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, table.encoded_length()
00094         + range.encoded_length() + scan_spec.encoded_length());
00095     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00096     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00097     scan_spec.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00098     return cbuf;
00099   }
00100 
00101   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_destroy_scanner(int scanner_id) {
00102     CommHeader header(COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER);
00103     header.gid = scanner_id;
00104     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 4);
00105     cbuf->append_i32(scanner_id);
00106     return cbuf;
00107   }
00108 
00109   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_fetch_scanblock(int scanner_id) {
00110     CommHeader header(COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK);
00111     header.gid = scanner_id;
00112     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 4);
00113     cbuf->append_i32(scanner_id);
00114     return cbuf;
00115   }

00117   CommBuf *
00118   RangeServerProtocol::create_request_drop_table(const TableIdentifier &table) {
00119     CommHeader header(COMMAND_DROP_TABLE);
00120     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, table.encoded_length());
00121     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00122     return cbuf;
00123   }

00126     CommHeader header(COMMAND_STATUS);
00127     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header);

00143   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_replay_begin(uint16_t group) {
00144     CommHeader header(COMMAND_REPLAY_BEGIN);
00145     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 2);
00146     cbuf->append_i16(group);
00147     return cbuf;
00148   }

00150   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::
00151   create_request_replay_load_range(const TableIdentifier &table,
00152       const RangeSpec &range, const RangeState &range_state) {
00153     CommHeader header(COMMAND_REPLAY_LOAD_RANGE);
00154     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, table.encoded_length()
00155         + range.encoded_length() + range_state.encoded_length());
00156     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00157     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00158     range_state.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00159     return cbuf;

00163   RangeServerProtocol::create_request_replay_update(StaticBuffer &buffer) {
00164     CommHeader header(COMMAND_REPLAY_UPDATE);
00165     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 0, buffer);
00166     return cbuf;

00175   CommBuf *
00176   RangeServerProtocol::create_request_drop_range(const TableIdentifier &table,
00177                                                  const RangeSpec &range) {
00178     CommHeader header(COMMAND_DROP_RANGE);
00179     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, table.encoded_length()
00180                                 + range.encoded_length());
00181     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00182     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00183     return cbuf;
